Cheney & Kinzinger may not be in my party but in this fight, we are all on the same side. 

America is coming back. And the darkness you thrive in, Kevin, where you cower, will soon be illuminated. And the best part, we‚Äôre going to have a lot of fun redeeming this great country.

For too long, too many of us have been too quiet, allowing a vocal minority flood the zone with deadly lies about the election and the vaccine. 

Those days are over, Kevin. 

Americans will always choose law & order over chaos. We choose democracy over authoritarianism (3/4)

But you‚Äôre betting against America. We‚Äôre not perfect. But our story always evolves with us seeking & shaping a more perfect Union. 

The path you have chosen, Kevin, ends in a cul-de-sac. 

America is coming back. And while we move forward you and your kind will be left behind.

Today you chose this violent insurrectionist over your colleagues @RepKinzinger and @RepLizCheney. 

You chose violence over voting.

Unity is our antidote. We are not fully back. But with Biden and Dems‚Äô leadership we are on our way. America has been knocked down before. But the story of America is built on comebacks. It‚Äôs exciting to see it take shape. This is the Comeback America agenda. 

#ComebackAmerica

But we are not out of the woods. Inflation is hitting all of us. Wages are flat. Crime is on the rise in many cities. And the virus has shown an ability to rebound. 

We‚Äôve got to keep our guard up and we‚Äôll be fully back. Biden and Dems are up for leading and uniting (3/4)

The economy is growing at a record clip. Americans are going back to work. 

We have the virus on the ropes‚Äî2/3 of us are vaccinated and vaccines for babies and toddlers coming soon. 

World leaders respect us and we are taking on challenge of Terrorism/Russia/China/Climate (2/4)

7 mil new jobs in Biden‚Äôs 1st year. This is an American comeback story.üßµ

Biden inherited from Trump one of the worst economies & a global pandemic. On the world stage, we‚Äôd alienated our friends. It felt like America had lost her way. But Biden believed we could come back (1/4)
